text: Are you here to aid those humans? Have you fallen for their lies? Then there is nothing but death here for you
Welcome stranger, have a look at some of my goods!
Is that Arcane board in your hands!? Well, nevermind, we need your help to defeat the dragon
I'm on it, can you teach me something?
It is east from here, we need your help! I can even teach you a valuable skill
I'm glad you're still alive. You're getting close. Ready for another lesson?
There seems to be a lot of gold and treasure inside this strange looking chest
I see you might be interested in magical tiles. I can sell you some, but you won't get my rare one
The dragon is gone, you saved us! Now give us Arcane Board, so we can take care of it and you can enjoy your well deserved rest
What If I don't want to give it back?
This part of the story will be told in full game
